'''Place of Revelations''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during the {{Quest|Memories That Should Not Exist}}.

==Chests==
# An exquisite chest on a low platform in front of the player as they ascend to the second floor via Four-Leaf Sigil
# A common chest on the right next to a stone statue after opening the big mechanism operated door

==Walkthrough==

# Go forward
# Glide down towards a broken bridge with five broken statues holding a bright yellow ore
# Go forward and defeat the monsters
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Stretchy Anemo Fungus*2; Stretchy Geo Fungus*3}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Stretchy Pyro Fungus*4; Grounded Hydroshroom}}
# Access the upper floor via the side door that has opened and the Four-Leaf Sigils
# Continue upwards with the stairs and interact with the console to open the door
# Defeat {{Enemy List|Ruin Guard}}
# Interact with the console to start a cutscene
# Rotate the devices so that the runes are pointing in the direction indicated by the light
# Continue forward for a cutscene
# Defeat {{Enemy List|Abyss Herald: Frost Fall}}
# Talk to Dainslef
